text: Christopher Adam "Chris" Daughtry (born December 26, 1979) is an American singer. He is best known for being the fourth-place finisher on American Idol. He is also the lead singer of Daughtry. His band released their first album in 2006. Studio Albums By Daughtry. # Daughtry (2006) # Leave This Town (2009) # Break The Spell (2011) # Baptized (2013) # Cage To Rattle (2018) # Dearly Beloved (2021) == Other websites == * Official website * Chris Daughtry at WikiMusicGuide * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American Idol contestants Category:Singers from North Carolina
title: Chris Daughtry
